skillTree.localised_description: The slightest glance, the merest glimpse from one of the Dark Gods is sufficient to propel their playthings to ever-greater feats of desolation.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +40%

skillTree.localised_description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Skin Wolves in Huern's service enjoy speed and skill beyond even their preternatural capabilities.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +10 for Skin Wolves units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +15 for Skin Wolves units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%

Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%

Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

skillTree.localised_description: All Skin Wolves have the ability to regenerate their horrid forms, even as humans.

effects.description: Wound recovery time: -3
Passive ability: "Regeneration"

skillTree.localised_description: Trained personally by the Wolf Chieftain, these Wolves guard the leaders of the Tribe with their lives.

effects.description: Ability: "Call of the Pack"

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a pack of Giant Wolves

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +3 for Skin Wolf units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Although Wulfrik is the better-known bearer of this title, Huern is possessed of a keen curiosity about the wider world. Having secured a land for his tribe, he now sets forth on many journeys to see what there is to discover, hunt, or conquer.

effects.description: Campaign line of sight: +25%
Passive Ability: "Scourge of Naglfari" when in Skin Wolf form

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases as the unit takes damage

skillTree.localised_description: Fast and vicious, the Tribe of the Wolf's hunting packs spread fear and terror, striking where they are needed most.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +15%
	(Lord's army)

Enemy leadership: -5
	(local region)

skillTree.localised_description: Though they once were drifters and vagrants, the elite warriors of the Tribe of the Wolf have proven themselves to be a disciplined unit to be feared.

effects.description:
Leadership: +10 for all Skin Wolf units
	(Lord's army)
Melee attack: +20

skillTree.localised_description: The beasts within can get further blessings from the Dark Gods. Sharper claws or unbreakable bodies are some of them.

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +10 for Skin Wolf units
	(Lord's army)
Battle healing cap: +25%

skillTree.localised_description: "My wolves, rage! My wolves, howl! My wolves, fight!"

effects.description: Ability: "Moonlit Bloodlust" when in Skin Wolf form

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +15
Charge bonus: +30

skillTree.localised_description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

effects.description: Armour: +7
Armour: +15

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

effects.description: Melee defence: +6
Melee defence: +12

skillTree.localised_description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

effects.description: Melee attack: +6
Melee attack: +12

skillTree.localised_description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

effects.description: Ability: "Foe-Seeker"

skillTree.localised_description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%
Weapon strength: +20%

skillTree.localised_description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

effects.description: Hit points: +7%
Hit points: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

effects.description: Leadership: +6
Leadership: +12

skillTree.localised_description: Blink and you die.

effects.description: Speed: +7%
Speed: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

effects.description: Ability: "Deadly Onslaught"

skillTree.localised_description: A Chaos Lord dominates – lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)
Character's aura leadership effect: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Those who do not bend the knee to the Gods of the North soon find all they hold dear obliterated before them.

skillTree.localised_description: Only the fiercest creatures can survive the frozen north; the strongest are rounded up for war and starved into viciousness, ready for the next battle.

skillTree.localised_description: The intense cold cuts into the flesh, burning the foe's extremities until they drop off altogether!

skillTree.localised_description: The razor-sharp hail of the north is not the only danger in the Norscan sky – its airborne beasts are just as deadly and far less predictable.

skillTree.localised_description: In spite of their savage nature, they are possessed of a savage code of conduct and form a loose brotherhood of those considered worthy.

skillTree.localised_description: No beast too large, no adversary too great; no quarry - mortal or otherwise - can evade them.

skillTree.localised_description: The intense cold and near-constant darkness of the far north make for a certain kind of killer.

skillTree.localised_description: The freezing darkness and stunning violence of the far north bring no small solace to those who have lost everything and wish to forget.

skillTree.localised_description: There can be no turning back for those whose souls are turning black.

effects.description: Ability: "Stand or Die!"
Replaces: "Rally!"

skillTree.localised_description: There is no other choice. There never was.

effects.description: Ability: "Fight or Die!"
Replaces: "Rally!"

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +5%

skillTree.localised_description: That which is not offered up to the Dark Gods of the North in tribute is harvested by their servants for their own petty gain.

effects.description: Income from post-battle loot: +5%
Income from post-battle loot: +10%
Income from post-battle loot: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -15%

skillTree.localised_description: The bleak, brutal landscape of the far north breeds bloody, warlike tribes in thrall to Chaos' delicious, twisted power.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Maybe it is the influence of the Dark Gods that has caused the populace to burgeon and proliferate beyond their natural bounds?

effects.description:
Growth: +8
	(local province)

Growth: +20
	(local province)

Growth: +36
	(local province)

skillTree.localised_description: After battle the mangled gore that remains is devoured by Huern and his ravenous, insatiable Werekin.

effects.description:
Hero recruit rank: +6 for Skin Wolf Werekin
	(local province)
Hero capacity: +3 for Skin Wolf Werekin

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

Enemy battle reinforcement time: +50%

Enemy battle reinforcement time: +50%

skillTree.localised_description: There's something about the harsh, unforgiving nature of northern life that makes its occupants fight harder and longer than many of their soft, southern equivalents.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +1
	(Lord's army)

Recruit rank: +2
	(Lord's army)

Recruit rank: +3
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Something strange - something no scholar really wishes to discover - governs who dies and who lives in the warlike northern wastes.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +4%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: War and glory before the Gods are the determining elements in every decision made; there is nothing else worth living - or dying - for.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -3%
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -6%
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -9%

skillTree.localised_description: The tendrils (and tentacles!) of the Northern Gods reach down from the poles and far across the world, twisting and corrupting all they touch.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +150
	(Lord's army)

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

factionEffects.localised_description: The Wolf Chieftain commands Wolf and Skinwolf into battle and they obey every command.

effects.description: Recruit Skin Wolf Packlords to lead your armies across the world. Huern and his Packlords have access to unique Hunting Journey targets. Defeat armies with specific enemies to unlock powerful buffs for the lord or their army.
Skin Wolf Packlords have access to mobile Hunting Camps which provide limited recruitment options and unlock improvements for their army in both campaign and battle.

Upkeep: -20% for Skinwolves, Norscan Ice Wolves and Norscan Warhounds
	(all armies)

Melee attack: +5 for Skin Wolf, Norscan Ice Wolves, Rotblood Hound & Norscan Warhound units
	(all armies)

items.colour_text: Huern has risen far, but he has not forgotten the treatment which killed his mother and forced him to struggle to live as a child. This keepsake of his dying mother ensures that he will never forget—and will always despise—those with power who abuse it.

effects.description: Passive Ability: "Alruna's Deathsong"

attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

effects.description: Spell resistance: 15%

items.colour_text: When battle is spent, a Skin Wolf’s transformation is reversed and like a newborn the human must tear its way free of the monstrous form. Huern has crafted an armour from this hide, a fearsome thing of cursed leather and black fur.

effects.description: Armour: +20
Missile resistance: 15%
Physical resistance: 10%

items.colour_text: Torn from the bloody fingers of the previous ruler of the Naglfari Plain, this horn rallies the spirit of the Tribe of the Wolf and is proof that Huern has earned his place among the lords of Norsca.

effects.description: Ability: "Rally the Tribe"

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

effects.description: Income from post-battle loot: +15%

Income from raiding: +25%
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The wolves and Skin Wolves of Norsca gather under the banner of the Black Wolf, drawn by his legend and bound by his strength.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +2% for Skin Wolf, Norscan Ice Wolves & Norscan Warhound units for each confederated Norscan tribe
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Vanguard deployment for Norscan Ice Wolves
	(Lord's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
